sentences.en: A blister forms, usually on the legs or feet.
sentences.cn: 有一种形式, 通常是在腿部或是脚上.

sentences.en: A compression bandage placed over a blister can provide relief.
sentences.cn: 用紧缩绑带覆盖于脚泡上能够起到缓解的作用.

sentences.en: He broke the blister with a needle.
He is not used to manual work and his hands blister easily.
sentences.cn: 他不惯于体力工作,他的手容易起泡.

sentences.en: He pricked the blister on his heel with a sterilized needle.
sentences.cn: 他用一根消过毒的针扎破他脚后跟上的水秙.

sentences.en: His skin was beginning to blister.

sentences.cn: 我 [ 他的手 ] 容易起泡.

sentences.en: I have a blister on my heel because my shoe is too tight.
sentences.cn: 鞋子太紧了,我脚后跟起了个泡.

sentences.en: I was bothered about the blister on my hand.
sentences.cn: 手上起的水泡让我心烦。

sentences.en: It is not a good idea to burst a blister.
sentences.cn: 把水泡挑破不是个好主意。

sentences.en: Main show is blister, debaucjed, desquamate, local acuteness Sao itchs.
sentences.cn: 主要表现为水疱 、 糜烂 、 脱皮, 局部有剧烈瘙痒.

sentences.en: My boot is pressing against a blister on my toe.
sentences.cn: 我的靴子挤压了我脚趾上的水秙.

sentences.en: New shoes always give me blisters.
sentences.cn: 我穿新鞋脚上总是起泡。

sentences.en: The affected skin turns red and may blister.
sentences.cn: 受感染的皮肤会变红，还有可能起水疱。

sentences.en: The bandage must be put on when the blister breaks.
sentences.cn: 水疱一旦破了就必须用绷带包扎起来。

sentences.en: The paint will blister in the heat..
Ultrasound . PET - synchronous links . Blister - sealing machine, and other packaging machinery.
sentences.cn: PET同步熔断机. 吸塑封口机等各种包装机械.

words.tran_cn: 起水疱；起气泡；使受暴晒（blister的ing形式）
水泡；[医]水疱；[冶]气泡；砂眼；起泡剂
使起水泡；痛打；猛烈抨击

phrases.tran_cn: 罩板包装（硬底上有凸起透明罩的物品包装）
泡罩包装；硬质泡沫塑料衬垫包装

trans.tran_en: a swelling on your skin containing clear liquid, caused, for example, by a burn or continuous rubbing

trans.tran_cn: 使起水泡；痛打；猛烈抨击
trans.tran_en: to develop blisters, or make blisters form
